informal_statement: What is the largest negative integer $x$ satisfying $$24x \equiv 15 \pmod{1199}~?$$ Show that it is -449.
formal_statement:
theorem mathd_numbertheory_765:
  fixes x :: int
  assumes "x < 0"
    and "(24 * x) mod 1199 = 15"
  shows "x \<le> -449"
